titleStmt.title: An ephemeris for the year 1654, being the second after leap-year by Nich. Culpeper.
titleStmt.author: Culpeper, Nicholas, 1616-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Macock for the Company of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: "Together with a judgment, 1. on the great eclipse of the sun, August 2, 2. on the opposition of Saturn and Jupiter, 3. on the quarterly ingresses of the sun into the equinoctial and solstitial points, 4. monthly observations."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
